definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Entity" id="None">None</variable><variable type="Number" id="nb">nb</variable><variable type="Number" id="nb2">nb2</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_entity"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:None</field><value name="VAL"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:nb</field><value name="VAL"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:nb2</field><value name="VAL"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">    double speed =nb/4.0;   &#10;    Vec3 motionVector = entity.getDeltaMovement();&#10;            Vec3 rotationVector = entity.getLookAngle();</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">        Vec3 newMotion = new Vec3(&#10;                motionVector.x + speed * Math.sin(rotationVector.x),&#10;                nb2,&#10;                motionVector.z + speed * Math.sin(rotationVector.z)&#10;        );&#10;        entity.setDeltaMovement(newMotion);</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
